english.segment1: Close the door to be sure. As I take a new direction. I leave behind my former ways. And cast aside this world's affections
english.segment2: And I won't think twice because
english.segment3: Your love healed my broken heart. And Your love bought me a brand new start. A brand new start
english.segment4: The wisdom of the cross is foolish. To the one who won't receive it. But it is power just the same. To all who will believe it
english.segment6: Your love healed my broken heart. And Your love bought me a brand new start. A brand new start
english.segment7: I'm never goin' back. To that old place. Never goin' back. Since my past has been erased. Never goin' back. In His grace I will remain. Never goin' back. To my old ways
